CustomField.description: Campo para registrar a idade do funcionário.
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT( ISBLANK( DateOfBirth__c ) ) ,
IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( DateOfBirth__c ) , DAY( DateOfBirth__c ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ),
YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( DateOfBirth__c ),
YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( DateOfBirth__c ) -1 ),
null)
CustomField.label: Idade
